string.name: html_style
string.Data: <head><meta name=\"viewport\" content=\"width=device-width, initial-scale=1\"> <style type="text/css">@font-face { font-family: MyFont; src: url("raw/font_syst_regular_recompile.otf")}body { font-family: MyFont; font-size: medium; text-align: justify; line-height: 1.8;}p {line-height: 1.8;}</style> </head> <body style=\'margin:0;padding:0;background:#fefefe;color:#474747;\'>
